E-Mail Messages
Date: Thursday, 2/2/1991
Subject: Fan Reaction
Hello Boss,
Our fans aren't really happy about the loss of Tony Phillips.
The overall fan interest decreases slightly.

Sincerly,
Your PR Director



Date: Thursday, 2/2/1991
Subject: Contract offer
You have to be kidding me with your offer.
Offer more money or I will not even think about it.

Regards,
Barry Bonds



Date: Thursday, 2/2/1991
Subject: Your offer sounds good
I have to admit that I like your offer.
So far, it's the best one I've received.

Regards,
Ozzie Guillen



Date: Friday, 2/3/1991
Subject: I'll sign elsewhere
Sorry, Pittsburgh has made the best overall offer.
I'll sign with them. Good luck this season!

Regards,
Barry Bonds
